field.label: Name
field.help: Name to identify this error message.

field.label: Error code
field.help:
The HTTP status code.
NOTE: It is important to understand that error messages are NOT meant to rewrite errors returned by the server, but errors detected and returned by HAProxy. This is why the list of supported errors is limited to a small set.

field.label: Content
field.help: Paste the content of your error messages here. The message must represent the full HTTP response and include required HTTP headers. It should not exceed the configured buffer size, which generally is 8 or 16 kB.
